messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On August 6, DET. I. J. Thompson was notified of a series of cyber attacks targeting local businesses. Key informants were Mr. Harper, an IT specialist, and Ms. Wagner, a business owner. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. K. L. Vega - OPERATIONS Det. Thompson, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective M. N. Ortiz and Detective O. P. Perez collaborated with cyber security firms. REID 11:00 Cyber Attacks Mr. Harper traced the malware source, and Ms. Wagner described the attack's impact. Analysis. Technician Stephanie extracted digital footprints. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Thompson Sr, Det. Ortiz, Det. Perez OPERATIONS Lt. Vega INFORMANT Wagner, Victoria 155 Oak Path, CyberCity, Virginia 216-1125. 94740. REID 11:00 Cyber Attacks By 1:30 PM, Detectives Thompson, Ortiz, and Perez, with guidance from Lieutenant Vega, identified a potential hacker group. Captain Q. R. Sanders initiated collaborations with federal cyber units. Sergeant S. T. Grant and Sergeant U. V. Hall reviewed recent cyber incidents for patterns. By 3:45 PM, three group members were tracked and apprehended. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Thompson Sr, Det. Ortiz, Det. Perez OPERATIONS Lt. Vega AFFIDAVIT - Cyber Attacks Report 1) Malware Analysis 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Digital Footprints 5) Server Logs (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE W. Adams C.C.P.D. 37.155 P84 3975 Harper, BEN NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 215-4275 DETECTIVE: I. THOMPSON ITEM: 84-5800- 114 CRIME: 11:00 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 85205 - CONFIRMED John Doe DATE 2/19/25 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. I. J. Thompson  Officer Context: On August 6, DET. I. J. Thompson was notified of a series of cyber attacks targeting local businesses. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. K. L. Vega  Officer Context: Lt. K. L. Vega - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective M. N. Ortiz  Officer Context: Detective M. N. Ortiz and Detective O. P. Perez collaborated with cyber security firms. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective O. P. Perez  Officer Context: Detective M. N. Ortiz and Detective O. P. Perez collaborated with cyber security firms. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Stephanie  Officer Context: Analysis. Technician Stephanie extracted digital footprints. Officer Role: Technician (from the Crime Lab) Officer Name: Detective Thompson  Officer Context: By 1:30 PM, Detectives Thompson, Ortiz, and Perez, with guidance from Lieutenant Vega, identified a potential hacker group. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Ortiz  Officer Context: By 1:30 PM, Detectives Thompson, Ortiz, and Perez, with guidance from Lieutenant Vega, identified a potential hacker group. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Perez  Officer Context: By 1:30 PM, Detectives Thompson, Ortiz, and Perez, with guidance from Lieutenant Vega, identified a potential hacker group. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain Q. R. Sanders  Officer Context: Captain Q. R. Sanders initiated collaborations with federal cyber units. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant S. T. Grant  Officer Context: Sergeant S. T. Grant and Sergeant U. V. Hall reviewed recent cyber incidents for patterns. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant U. V. Hall Officer Context: Sergeant S. T. Grant and Sergeant U. V. Hall reviewed recent cyber incidents for patterns. Officer Role: Sergeant
